response: "I feel like I have to constantly prove myself to everyone around me."
"No matter how hard I try, I always feel like I'm falling short of expectations."
"I'm so tired of feeling like I have to fit into a certain mold to be accepted."
"Why do I feel like I have to be perfect all the time? No one else is."
"I don't even know who I am anymore. I'm just trying to be who everyone wants me to be."
"I'm starting to realize that these standards of perfection are impossible to achieve."
"It's like I'm trapped in this cycle of feeling like I'm not good enough and then trying too hard to prove myself."
"I'm exhausted from constantly comparing myself to others and feeling like I'm not measuring up."
"I wish I could just be happy with who I am and not worry about what others think."
"I need to remind myself that it's okay to make mistakes and that perfection is not the goal."
